activities: Processing and storing of information containing the names, addresses, and telephone numbers of Legal Entities on behalf of EU based clients.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Names, addresses, and telephone numbers of Legal Entities.  Data covered does include manually processed data.
recoursemech:
For complaints that cannot be resolved between APT and the
complainant, APT has agreed to participate in the following dispute resolution procedures in the investigation and resolution of complaints to resolve disputes pursuant to the Safe Harbor Principles:

1. for disputes involving all personal information received by APT from Switzerland, APT has agreed and to cooperate with the Swiss FDPIC;

2. for disputes involving all other personal information received by APT from the EEA, APT has agreed to participate in the dispute resolution procedures of the American Arbitration Association (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program).
